titles: A seasonable warning and serious exhortation to, and expostulation with, the inhabitants of Aberdene concerning this present dispensation and day of Gods living visitation towards them.
author: Barclay, Robert, 1648-1690.
notes: Dated and signed on p. 2: This came before me to signifie unto you by writing at Urie the 12 of the first moneth, 1672, Robert Barclay.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
